name: Temple Fall (PlayGames_MakeGames, Cindro)
description: Temple Fall is an endless runner game with a twist - you're falling instead of running! Armed with anti-fall boots that reduce all fall damage at the cost of bouncing you upwards, do your best to fall fast enough so that the flying monkeys don't catch you, but eventually, they will. However, you can get trophies for clearing certain numbers of floors! Can you get the platinum trophy, or go even further beyond and beat my high score of 69 floors cleared?
